replies.body: I bought 60 mystery skins during the event why i only got one free gift?
I would also like to know this, i bought 48
Yep me to bought 21, only got one free skin back.

I bought 12 and only got 1.

"for every six mystery items you purchase for yourself or friends, you’ll receive a free Mystery Skin"

The didn't say that it caps at 6, but for each 6. I tried re-logging just in case their coding had a minor hiccup, nothing. What should we be doing? Waiting or reporting?

"For every six Mystery items you purchase, you’ll get one free Mystery skin. So if you buy six, you’ll get one free. If you buy 12, you’ll get two free. And so on."

I'm sure they've noticed by now what's happened and hopefully they'll fix it soon
Let's just wait for one more day.
Same. I bought 10 everyday, but only got one free gift. :/
exactly the same with me!
i want to know it will be count if i buying the mystery champion today?****

Championship Riven?

I'm extremely happy with the mystery skins, some random dude I met in a game sent me RP, so i bought a single mystery skin and pulled blackfrost anivia. More than tripled the free money that I put in XD. Not to mention I was thinking about maining Anivia.
I bought myself 18 skins too, and I received myself 1 mystery skin too, I spoke with a riot employee and what he had to say was 'To give you a schedule, they'll be distributed by the 25th of August'.
Can't wait to get mine! Really wish they don't give them to me exactly seven days after Bilgewater ends... I have 3 skins for {{champion:25}} thanks to those chests.
Still waiting hope it comes soon!
Bought 6 skins, all were average, sent my missus a 490 mystery skin, Final Boss Veigar -_-
HAHA the feels man. I gifted my friend 5 mystery skins a while back and the 4 good skins he got were Pulsefire Ezreal, Dunkmaster Darius, Firefighter Tristana and Steel Legion Garen.

During Bilgewater: Burning Tides, for every six mystery items you purchase for** yourself or friends**, you’ll receive a free Mystery Skin after the event ends!
